Package Controller

Class CustomerAdd_or_ModController

java.lang.Object
Controller.CustomerAdd_or_ModController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerAdd_or_ModController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class creates a form you can add or modify customer.
